#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int read_int(){
char c;
while( '0' > (c=getchar()) || c > '9' );
int s = c - '0';
while( '0' <= (c=getchar()) && c <= '9' )s = s * 10 + ( c-'0');
return s;}
int main()
{
long long int test,n;
cin>>test;
for(int i=0;i<test;i++)
{
n=read_int();
if(n==1){cout<<0<<endl;}
else if(n%2){printf("%lld\n",((n-1)*(n-1))/2-2+n);}
else {printf("%lld\n",((n)*(n))/2-1);}
}
}
